short_summary: Proposal Level 3 Web Architect Task-Based Informatics Professional Services
description: Provide a Senior Web Architect for TBIPS.",
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Web Architect – Level 3
### Tender Title
Web Architect – Level 3 (Architecte Web – Niveau 3)

### Reference Number
cb-4441-58394228

### Solicitation Number
2023-01054

### Publication Date
2023-03-24

### Tender Closing Date
2023-04-21T14:00:00

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (Demande de proposition)

### Selection Criteria
The evaluation will be based on the combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Tender Description
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires a Senior Web Architect to provide Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS).

### Update
This notice has been amended:

* A notice of proposed procurement and request for proposal draft was updated on 2023-03-31.

### Contracting Entity
Contracting entity: Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
Address: 59 Camelot Drive
City: Ottawa
Province: Ontario
Postal Code: K2G 5X4
Country: Canada

### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to contractors who have registered with the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity
This tender is open to contractors who can bid for work in Canada.

### Regions of Delivery
This tender is open to contractors who can deliver services in the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Contact Information
If you have any questions about this tender, please contact:
Catherine Clairoux
catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca
(343) 596-9265

### Attachments
The tender package can be downloaded from the following links:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4441/2023-01054-npp_0.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4441/2023-01054-rfp-bid-closing-april-21%2C-2023_0.pdf
